item.text: From Paul and Timothy, slaves of Christ Jesus, to all the saints in Christ Jesus who are in Philippi, with the overseers and deacons.
Grace and peace to you from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ!
I thank my God every time I remember you.

I <st data-num="3842" class="">always</st> <st data-num="1162" class="">pray</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="5479" class="">joy</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> <st data-num="1162" class="">prayer</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>

<st data-num="1909" class="">because</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2842" class="">participation</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2098" class="">gospel</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="4413" class="">first</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> <st data-num="891" class="">until</st> <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st>.<n id="2" />

For I am <st data-num="3982" class="">sure</st> of <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="846">very</st> thing,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> the one<n id="2" /> who <st data-num="1728" class="">began</st> a <st data-num="18" class="">good</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">work</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> will <st data-num="2005" class="">perfect</st> it<n id="4" /> <st data-num="891" class="">until</st> the <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> of <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>.

<st data-num="2531" class="">For</st><n id="1" /> it <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1342" class="">right</st> for <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> to <st data-num="5426" class="">think</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">about</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="1223" class="">because</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> my <st data-num="2588" class="">heart</st>,<n id="2" /> since <st data-num="5037" class="">both</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="1199" class="">imprisonment</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="627" class="">defense</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="951" class="">confirmation</st> of the <st data-num="2098" class="">gospel</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1510">became</st> <st data-num="4791" class="">partners</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> Godâ€™s <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="4791" class="">together with</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> is <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3144" class="">witness</st> that I <st data-num="1971">long for</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="4698" class="">affection</st> of <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> I <st data-num="4336" class="">pray</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st>, <st data-num="2443" class="">that</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="26" class="">love</st> may <st data-num="4052" class="">abound</st> <st data-num="2089">even</st> <st data-num="3123" class="">more</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3123" class="">more</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1922" class="">knowledge</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956">every kind</st> of <st data-num="144" class="">insight</st>

<st data-num="1519" class="">so that</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> can <st data-num="1381" class="">decide</st> what is <st data-num="1308" class="">best</st>, <st data-num="2443">and thus</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="1506" class="">sincere</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="677" class="">blameless</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> of <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>,
filled with the fruit of righteousness that comes through Jesus Christ to the glory and praise of God.
I want you to know, brothers and sisters, that my situation has actually turned out to advance the gospel:

The<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3650" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="4232" class="">imperial guard</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everyone</st> <st data-num="3062" class="">else</st> <st data-num="5318 1096">knows</st><n id="3" /> that <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">am</st> in <st data-num="1199" class="">prison</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">for the sake of</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>,
and most of the brothers and sisters, having confidence in the Lord because of my imprisonment, now more than ever dare to speak the word fearlessly.
Some, to be sure, are preaching Christ from envy and rivalry, but others from goodwill.

The latter do so <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="26" class="">love</st> because they <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> I am <st data-num="2749" class="">placed</st> here <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="627" class="">defense</st> of the <st data-num="2098">gospel</st>.

The former <st data-num="2605" class="">proclaim</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2052">selfish ambition</st>, <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="55" class="">sincerely</st>, because they <st data-num="3633" class="">think</st> they can <st data-num="1453" class="">cause</st> <st data-num="2347" class="">trouble</st> for me in <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="1199" class="">imprisonment</st>.<n id="1" />

What is the result? Only that in every way, whether in pretense or in truth, Christ is being proclaimed, and in this I rejoice.

Yes, and I will continue to rejoice,

<st data-num="1063">for</st> I <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> will <st data-num="576">turn out</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="4991" class="">deliverance</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="1162" class="">prayers</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="2024" class="">help</st> of the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> of <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>.

<st data-num="1473" class="">My</st> <st data-num="603" class="">confident</st> <st data-num="1680" class="">hope</st><n id="1" /> is <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> I will <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3762">no way</st> be <st data-num="153" class="">ashamed</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> that <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">complete</st> <st data-num="3954" class="">boldness</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> <st data-num="3842" class="">always</st>, <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> will be <st data-num="3170" class="">exalted</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st>, <st data-num="1535" class="">whether</st> I <st data-num="2222">live</st> <st data-num="1535" class="">or</st> <st data-num="2288">die</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, <st data-num="2198" class="">living</st> is <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="599" class="">dying</st> is <st data-num="2771" class="">gain</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">Now</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> I am to go on <st data-num="2198" class="">living</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4561" class="">body</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> will mean <st data-num="2590" class="">productive</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">work</st><n id="2" /> for <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">yet</st> I <st data-num="3756">donâ€™t</st> <st data-num="1107" class="">know</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">which</st> I <st data-num="138">prefer</st>:<n id="3" />

I <st data-num="4912">feel torn</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">between</st> the <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st><n id="1" /> because I <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> a <st data-num="1939" class="">desire</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="360" class="">depart</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>, which is <st data-num="2909">better</st> <st data-num="4183 3123">by far</st>,

<st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> it is <st data-num="316">more vital</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">for</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">sake</st> that I <st data-num="1961" class="">remain</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722">in</st> the <st data-num="4561" class="">body</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> since I am <st data-num="3982" class="">sure</st> of <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st>, I <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> I will <st data-num="3306" class="">remain</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3887" class="">continue</st> with <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1519">for the sake</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4297" class="">progress</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5479" class="">joy</st> in the <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st>,<n id="2" />
so that what you can be proud of may increase because of me in Christ Jesus, when I come back to you.

Only conduct yourselves in a manner worthy of the gospel of Christ so thatâ€”whether I come and see you or whether I remain absentâ€”I should hear that you are standing firm in one spirit, with one mind, by contending side by side for the faith of the gospel,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> being <st data-num="4426" class="">intimidated</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3367">any way</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> your <st data-num="480" class="">opponents</st>. <st data-num="3748" class="">This</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st><n id="1" /> a <st data-num="1732">sign</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">their</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="684" class="">destruction</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4991" class="">salvation</st>â€”a sign <st data-num="3778">which</st><n id="3" /> is <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.

<st data-num="3754" class="">For</st> it has been <st data-num="5483" class="">granted</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3441">only</st> to <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> in <st data-num="5547">Christ</st> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> to <st data-num="3958" class="">suffer</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,
since you are encountering the same conflict that you saw me face and now hear that I am facing.
